item.title: Two Astronauts on an 8-Day Mission That Turned Into a 9-Month Odyssey
item.description: An exclusive interview with Suni Williams and Butch Wilmore, whose planned short mission to space turned into an adventure lasting much, much longer.

item.title: Forecasters Warn of ‘Wildfire Outbreak’ Across Texas and Oklahoma
item.description: Strong winds and dry conditions could help fuel fires in parts of the Southwest and the Plains on Friday.

item.title: Trump to Deliver Speech to Justice Dept. After Triumph in Battles Against It

item.title: Why Is Gavin Newsom Seeking Common Ground With the Right?
item.description: Democrats are desperate for leaders who will fight on their behalf, not flatter their enemies.
